question: Comet Encke orbits the sun every 50 years. Matt's dad saw the Comet when he was 28 years old. Matt saw the comet a second time when he was three times the age his dad was when he saw the Comet. How old was Matt when he saw the Comet for the first time?
answer:
Matt saw the Comet for the second time when he was 28 years * 3= <<28*3=84>>84 years old.
Comet Encke can be seen every 50 years, so Matt saw the comet for the first time when he was 84 years - 50 years = <<84-50=34>>34 years old.
#### 34
